response.overview: John Kramer (Tobin Bell) is a respected civil engineer and beloved husband.  Following a series of personal tragedies, he comes to believe that people can only appreciate their life when faced with impending death.  John decides to dedicate the rest of his life to inspiring the same appreciation in others by testing their will to live in diabolic traps and mortal games. He becomes known as “The Jigsaw Killer.”
response.title: Jigsaw: A History of Desperation
